\PackageError{config}{%
DOMjudge is not configured yet: edit 'etc/global.cfg' and then run 'make config'}{}

% generate any dvi output and possibly overwrite old files. Also
% prevents display of errors generated by missing config files,
% because of the default behaviour of latex of continueing processing
% after errors [sigh].

\end{document}
